pages.text: The power point is an important resource for this mod, which is obtained by killing the $(l:overview/world_spawn#fairy)maid fairy$().$(br2)Can be used for $(l:overview/multiblocks_altar)altar$() crafting.

When you holds the $(l:overview/gohei_and_danmaku)gohei$(), you can see your power point number in the upper left corner of the game screen. $(br2)The maximum power point is 5, and more than this number power point no longer increases.
